albums.name: Abbey Road
albums.summary: This is the Beatles' final studio album, known for its innovative production and the iconic cover with the band crossing a zebra crossing.

albums.name: Let It Bleed
albums.summary: This album features classic tracks like 'Gimme Shelter' and 'You Can't Always Get What You Want,' representing the peak of the Rolling Stones' psychedelic era.

albums.name: Led Zeppelin - IV
albums.summary: Considered one of the greatest rock albums of all time, featuring tracks like 'Stairway to Heaven.'
